column1: KHEN is an Elvish Sundocarme signifying "look at, see, observe, direct gaze"., p. 21 (form appearing as "KHEN- (also KEN-, KYEN-)"
column2: rejected entry "KHEN- look") The root is said to be "base of eye-words" and to be related to the root KEN., pp. 157, 187 (form appearing as "√KHEN." and "√KHEN")
